Question: Property
Answer: Description

Question: bottom
Answer: Specifies the bottom position of a positioned element

Question: clear
Answer: Specifies which sides of an element where other floating elements are not allowed

Question: clip
Answer: Clips an absolutely positioned element

Question: display
Answer: Specifies how a certain HTML element should be displayed

Question: float
Answer: Specifies whether or not a box should float

Question: height
Answer: Sets the height of an element

Question: left
Answer: Specifies the left position of a positioned element

Question: margin
Answer: Sets all the margin properties in one declaration

Question: margin-bottom
Answer: Sets the bottom margin of an element

Question: margin-left
Answer: Sets the left margin of an element

Question: margin-right
Answer: Sets the right margin of an element

Question: margin-top
Answer: Sets the top margin of an element

Question: max-height
Answer: Sets the maximum height of an element

Question: max-width
Answer: Sets the maximum width of an element

Question: min-height
Answer: Sets the minimum height of an element

Question: min-width
Answer: Sets the minimum width of an element

Question: overflow
Answer: Specifies what happens if content overflows an element's box

Question: overflow-x
Answer: Specifies whether or not to clip the left/right edges of the content, if it overflows the element's content area

Question: overflow-y
Answer: Specifies whether or not to clip the top/bottom edges of the content, if it overflows the element's content area

Question: padding
Answer: Sets all the padding properties in one declaration

Question: padding-bottom
Answer: Sets the bottom padding of an element

Question: padding-left
Answer: Sets the left padding of an element

Question: padding-right
Answer: Sets the right padding of an element

Question: padding-top
Answer: Sets the top padding of an element

Question: position
Answer: Specifies the type of positioning method used for an element (static, relative, absolute or fixed)

Question: right
Answer: Specifies the right position of a positioned element

Question: top
Answer: Specifies the top position of a positioned element

Question: visibility
Answer: Specifies whether or not an element is visible

Question: width
Answer: Sets the width of an element

Question: vertical-align
Answer: Sets the vertical alignment of an element

Question: z-index
Answer: Sets the stack order of a positioned element
